mods.note: In 1900 the State Penitentiary Board of Control purchased the 2,800 arpent Hope Plantation on both sides of the Bayou Teche three miles southeast of Jeanerette, LaThis plantation became the Hope State Farm and was dedicated to growing sugar caneSee, "Board of Control State Penitentiary Report," HV 8338 A2 1901, page 32a for a related image.

titleInfo.title: Andrew DLytle's Baton Rouge' Photograph Collection/
